name: A Thief's Call
description:
A Thief's Call is a 2D platformer, designed thematically around falling, where you play as a thief on an endless quest for riches. It's a short, five level game that allows for exploration in a compact environment. You must use all your ingenuity and skills as a thief to satisfy your lust for riches. 

All art assets came from the unity asset store. Credit given to Super Brutal Assets, Leaidan, Eldanu, and Grande Pixel.
